page.title: 07INDUSTRY AND EMPLOYMENT
page.content: The number of people employed in {farming}industries has{declined rapidly because of the introduction of new techniques.But the number of{new {industries}in the Kirkby Stephen area has kept the{unemployment}level{below the national level.There are 50 people at{Mass Transfer}manufacturing chemical handling & sewage disposal plant.Metal fabrications are also made. 50 people at{Cumbria Highways {Department}are responsable for maintaining 500 miles of roadway.50 people at{Heredities}make very fine models & statuettes by some of the best sculptors in the country. These models are sold in art shops in the UK & many are exported overseas.{ {Wilkinsons}is the only bobbin factory in the country.They make bobbins & pirns for this country & abroad.36 are employed in a growing business.
